title: Instantaneous power - power related to work

content.question: The work done on an object in joules as a function of time is given by the equation <math alttext="W of t equals, negative 4 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 pi t, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>W</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>. What is the instantaneous power delivered to the object at <math alttext="t equals 0.25 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 1 over pi, end fraction, watt" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1</mn></mstyle><mi>π</mi></mfrac><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>W</mtext></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
